nodes.text: Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes

Figrin D'an and the Modal Nodes was a seven-member band that performed at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina on the planet Tatooine and the H'unn Cabaret Pit on Nar Kaaga during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The band was known to play the song "Mad About Me."

In 1977's Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, seven Bith can be seen performing on stage in the cantina. An eighth Bith sits at a nearby booth. The 2011 Star Wars Legends source Star Wars Character Encyclopedia originally established that Sun'il Ei'de was the seventh Bith on stage during the film.
